item.title: Hot tech stock ETFs, from AI to quantum computing, have made investors lots of money. Is it time to sell?
item.description: AI has become the market's biggest story, helping drive a surge in thematic investing and ETFs. But experts warn these funds can fall as quickly as th...

item.title: JPMorgan Chase wins fight with fintech firms over fees to access customer data
item.description: The JPMorgan Chase deals mark a shift in the power dynamic between banks, middlemen and the fintech apps that are increasingly threatening incumbents.

item.title: Bitcoin falls below $95,000 as four-day rout picks up steam
item.description: The world's oldest cryptocurrency fell below $95,000 on Friday, deepening its plunge into the red.

item.title: Investor Ron Baron says the tech selloff is an opportunity and he's never selling personal Tesla stake
item.description: Baron said he's already made about $8 billion from Tesla over the years and that he believes he could make five times that over the next decade.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest premarket moves: Warner Bros. Discovery, Cidara Therapeutics, Avadel Pharmaceuticals and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.
